here.apikey: put here your here API APIkey, for more detail how you can get it see https://developer.here.com/documentation/identity-access-management/dev_guide/topics/plat-using-apikeys.html

api.openweathermap.appid: put here your openweathermap API key

api.yelp.Authorization: Bearer put your Yelp API Key here without removing Bearer word, please refer to the API yelp site for more details: https://www.yelp.com/developers/documentation/v3/authentication
